org.kohsuke.stapler.test

Class JettyTestCase

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • org.kohsuke.stapler.test.JettyTestCase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AncestorImplTest, BindTagJQueryTest, BindTagTest, BoundObjectTableTest, CompressionFilterTest, DispatcherTest, JavaScriptProxyTest, JsonOutputFilterTest, TagLibNamespaceExportTest

    public abstract class JettyTestCase
extends junit.framework.TestCase
    Base test case for embedded Jetty. Your test method runs with embedded Jetty with the instance of your test class bound to the root "application" object in Stapler. You can use WebClient to make HTTP calls, receive that on your test class, and inspect side-effects, etc.
    Author:
    Kohsuke Kawaguchi
